mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* insertPerson */ T_PMS003 (prsn_no, prsn_nm, jumin_no1, jumin_no2, sex_cd, acdmc_cd, work_start_dt, cert_cd, rsdnc_addr, cntrct_sect_cd, law_rgt_no1, law_rgt_no2, biz_rgt_no, law_biz_nm, ceo_nm, prsn_email_addr, tel_no, hp_no, tr_bank_nm, tr_acct_no, tr_dpstr_nm, pay_day_cd, memo_desc, prfl_atcht_fl_no, rgt_tm, rgtr_id, upt_tm, uptr_id) VALUES (#{prsnNo}, #{prsnNm}, #{juminNo1}, #{juminNo2}, #{sexCd}, #{acdmcCd}, #{workStartDt}, #{certCd}, #{rsdncAddr}, #{cntrctSectCd}, #{lawRgtNo1}, #{lawRgtNo2}, #{bizRgtNo}, #{lawBizNm}, #{ceoNm}, #{prsnEmailAddr}, #{telNo}, #{hpNo}, #{trBankNm}, #{trAcctNo}, #{trDpstrNm}, #{payDayCd}, #{memoDesc}, #{prflAtchtFlNo}, NOW(), #{rgtrId}, NOW(), #{uptrId})
mapper.delete: DELETE /* deletePerson */ FROM T_PMS003 WHERE prsn_no = #{prsnNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT /* selectPerson */ prsn_no AS prsnNo, prsn_nm AS prsnNm, jumin_no1 AS juminNo1, jumin_no2 AS juminNo2, sex_cd AS sexCd, acdmc_cd AS acdmcCd, work_start_dt AS workStartDt, cert_cd AS certCd, rsdnc_addr AS rsdncAddr, cntrct_sect_cd AS cntrctSectCd, law_rgt_no1 AS lawRgtNo1, law_rgt_no2 AS lawRgtNo2, biz_rgt_no AS bizRgtNo, law_biz_nm AS lawBizNm, ceo_nm AS ceoNm, prsn_email_addr AS prsnEmailAddr, tel_no AS telNo, hp_no AS hpNo, tr_bank_nm AS trBankNm, tr_acct_no AS trAcctNo, tr_dpstr_nm AS trDpstrNm, pay_day_cd AS payDayCd, memo_desc AS memoDesc, prfl_atcht_fl_no AS prflAtchtFlNo, rgt_tm AS rgtTm, rgtr_id AS rgtrId, upt_tm AS uptTm, uptr_id AS uptrId, (SELECT ATCHT_FL_ORGNL_NM FROM T_PMS005 where ATCHT_FL_NO=prfl_atcht_fl_no) AS fileName, (select group_concat(AA.skill_sect_cd ORDER BY AA.skill_sect_cd DESC ) from T_PMS004 AA where AA.prsn_no = #{prsnNo}) AS skillSectCd
FROM T_PMS003 WHERE 1 = 1 AND prsn_no = #{prsnNo}

SELECT /* selectListPerson */ max(prsn_no) AS prsnNo, max(prsn_nm) AS prsnNm, max(jumin_no1) AS juminNo1, max(jumin_no2) AS juminNo2, max(sex_cd) AS sexCd, max(acdmc_cd) AS acdmcCd, max(work_start_dt) AS workStartDt, max(cert_cd) AS certCd, max(rsdnc_addr) AS rsdncAddr, max(cntrct_sect_cd) AS cntrctSectCd, max(law_rgt_no1) AS lawRgtNo1, max(law_rgt_no2) AS lawRgtNo2, max(biz_rgt_no) AS bizRgtNo, max(law_biz_nm) AS lawBizNm, max(ceo_nm) AS ceoNm, max(prsn_email_addr) AS prsnEmailAddr, max(tel_no) AS telNo, max(hp_no) AS hpNo, max(tr_bank_nm) AS trBankNm, max(tr_acct_no) AS trAcctNo, max(tr_dpstr_nm) AS trDpstrNm, max(pay_day_cd) AS payDayCd, max(memo_desc) AS memoDesc, max(prfl_atcht_fl_no) AS prflAtchtFlNo, max(rgt_tm) AS rgtTm, max(rgtr_id) AS rgtrId, max(upt_tm) AS uptTm, max(uptr_id) AS uptrId,
(select group_concat(C.skill_sect_cd ORDER BY C.skill_sect_cd DESC ) from T_PMS004 C where C.prsn_no = AA.PRSN_NO) AS skillSectCd,
CAST(CONCAT( (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, max(work_start_dt), now()) DIV 12) ,'년 ', (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, max(work_start_dt), now()) % 12) , '개월') AS CHAR) AS totalWork,
DATE_FORMAT('20151221', '%Y-%m-%d') as lastWorkStartDt, DATE_FORMAT('20151221', '%Y-%m-%d') as lastWorkEndDt
FROM ( SELECT A.* , B.skill_sect_cd FROM T_PMS003 A left outer join T_PMS004 B on A.prsn_no = B.prsn_no WHERE 1 = 1
) AA GROUP BY AA.PRSN_NO ORDER BY AA.PRSN_NO DESC
LIMIT ${start}, ${pageSize}
